1-on-1 Mentoring for Developers

Available from December 2019

Do you want to get to the next level as a developer? Accelerate your career by working with me.

I provide affordable pairing sessions for developers of all skill-levels. We can pair in-person, or over the internet.

Do you need help squashing that super annoying bug? What about getting that important feature over the line? Maybe a React component just won't co-operate and the JavaScript involved makes your head spin. Or you need help navigating through a gnarly Rails application. I can help with all of these things.

Maybe you're starting out and you're looking for a teacher to help you learn the basics. I can help with that too!

We can sit and pair together for an hour or three on whatever it is you wish. I'm also happy to give advice and to answer your general career questions too!

Whatever you're stuck with, I can help you out! Get in touch.

Email mentoring@ryanbigg.com and let's talk about how I can help you out today.

I have over a decade of experience working on the web for some big companies, all while mentoring developers just like you. Now I'm wanting work with YOU to help you succeed as a developer.
